name: Specific Heat of a Substance - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
weigh the copper, iron, and aluminum.
place the copper, iron, and aluminum on the workbench
pick up the tablet with the specific heat table and controller
Record the weight and temperature of the samples on the specific heat table
lower the vacuum tube from the ceiling and attach it to the samples.
Place the samples in the steamer.
Start the steamer.
when the water in the steamer reaches 100°C, remove the sample from the steamer and measure its temperature
Activate the...
